text: The 2005 Croatian Football Super Cup was the seventh edition of the Croatian Football Super Cup, a football match contested by the winners of the previous season's Croatian First League and Croatian Football Cup competitions. The match was played on 15 July 2005 at Stadion Poljud in Split between 2004–05 Croatian First League winners Hajduk Split and 2004–05 Croatian Football Cup winners Rijeka. == Match details == {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="40%"| {| style="font-size:90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan=4|HAJDUK SPLIT: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| !!width="125"| !!width="35"| |- |GK ||19 || Tvrtko Kale |- |DF ||6|| Vlatko Đolonga (c) || || |- |DF ||13|| Mladen Bartulović |- |DF ||17 || Tonči Žilić |- |DF ||18|| Goran Granić |- |MF ||4 || Dario Damjanović |- |MF ||21 || Bulend Biščević || || |- |MF ||24 || Mario Grgurović |- |FW ||8|| Dragan Blatnjak || || |- |FW ||10 || Niko Kranjčar |- |FW ||30 || Tomislav Bušić |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |MF ||26|| Pablo Munhoz || || |- |DF ||21|| Josip Ćutuk || || |- |FW ||16|| Krešimir Makarin || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Miroslav Blažević |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" |colspan=4|RIJEKA: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| !!width="125"| !!width="35"| |- |GK ||1|| Velimir Radman |- |DF ||5 || Dario Knežević |- |DF ||6 || Peter Lérant |- |DF ||15 || Daniel Šarić (c) || || |- |DF ||16 || Fausto Budicin |- |DF ||20 || Krunoslav Rendulić |- |MF ||7 || Dragan Tadić |- |MF ||22 || Mario Prišć |- |FW ||9|| Zoran Zekić |- |FW ||13|| Petar Krpan || || |- |FW ||25|| Siniša Linić || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |MF ||3|| Marin Prpić || || |- |MF ||21|| Igor Novaković || || |- |FW ||11 || Neno Katulić || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Elvis Scoria |} |} {| style="width:100%; font-size:90%;" |- | style="width:50%; vertical- align:top;"| Assistant referees: Predrag Borovec (Višnjevac) Tomislav Šetka (Đakovo) |style="width:60%; vertical-align:top;"| Match rules *90 minutes. *30 minutes of extra-time if necessary. *Penalty shoot-out if scores still level *Seven named substitutes. *Maximum of three substitutions. |} == References == * 2005 Croatian Football Super Cup at HRnogomet.com 2005 Category:HNK Hajduk Split matches Category:HNK Rijeka matches Supercup
title: 2005 Croatian Football Super Cup
